title.rendered: Air Hong Kong in Lantau, Hong Kong

content.rendered:
Air Hong Kong is an all-cargo airline based in Chek Lap Kok, Hong Kong, with its main hub at Hong Kong International Airport. The airline operates an express freight network to 12 destinations in nine countries. Air Hong Kong was established in November 1986.

 

Air Hong Kong Address : 2nd Floor, Cathay Dragon House
11 Tung Fai Road
Hong Kong International Airport
Lantau
Hong Kong

Email: cargo_charter@cathaypacific.com, ahk.pln@airhongkong.com.hk

Air Hong Kong Official website : http://www.airhongkong.com.hk/

Fleet size: 13

Current fleet

  • Airbus A300-600F
  • Airbus A300-600RF
  • Airbus A330-200F
  • Airbus A330-300/P2F

Air Hong Kong Baggage Allowance

Air Hong Kong Baggage

View Air Hong Kong Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Air Hong Kong Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy, Cargo Clan Elite (by Cathay Pacific Cargo)

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Hong Kong in Lantau, Hong Kong Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Hong Kong in Lantau, Hong Kong: (click on the stars below)
